00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */

00087 
00088     // Check if we know a contact with the same IP or ID but not matching IP/ID and other limitations, similar checks like when adding a node to the table except allowing duplicates
00089     bool    IsAcceptableContact(const CContact *toCheck) const;
00090 
00091     // Returns a list of all contacts in all leafs of this zone.
00092     void     GetAllEntries(ContactList *result, bool emptyFirst = true) const;
00093

00095     void     GetClosestTo(uint32_t maxType, const CUInt128& target, const CUInt128& distance, uint32_t maxRequired, ContactMap *result, bool emptyFirst = true, bool setInUse = false) const;
00096 
00097     // Ideally: Returns all contacts that are in buckets of common range between us and the asker.
00098     // In practice: returns the contacts from the top (2^{logBase+1}) buckets.
00099     uint32_t GetBootstrapContacts(ContactList *results, uint32_t maxRequired) const;
